articles.author: Ben Church, CNN
articles.title: Manchester United brings Manchester City's 21-match winning streak to an end
articles.description: Manchester United ended Manchester City's 21-game winning streak with a brilliantly executed 2-0 victory at the Etihad Stadium on Sunday.

articles.title: Fareed: Biden sending message to Americans and the world
articles.description: Fareed Zakaria gives his take on the massive ramp-up of vaccines under President Joe Biden, who has marshaled the full power of the federal government to fight Covid-19.

articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: Apple is discontinuing the iMac Pro
articles.description: Apple is no longer making the iMac Pro, once the most-powerful computer the company offered.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: How the Murdochs are shaping the GOP for the next 4 years of Joe Biden
articles.description: Fox News follows the money and the Republican pary follows Fox News. Now, the network is setting the stage for what the next four years of the GOP might look like under the Biden administration.

articles.author: Peter Nickeas, CNN
articles.title: Why sweeping police reform over the last year has largely been elusive
articles.description: Sweeping reform over the last year has largely been elusive. Congress is limited in what it can impose on local police departments, even if it found the political will.
articles.content:
(CNN)In the year since Louisville police killed Breonna Taylor in an overnight drug raid, the Democratic-led US House of Representatives has passed a bill overhauling policing, twice.

articles.title: Bloopers, snafus and viral goofs: Inside pandemic-era TV
articles.description: CNN's Brian Stelter shows you how television production has adapted as anchors and guests continue to work from home during the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.author: Katie Lobosco and Tami Luhby, CNN
articles.title: What happens next with the Covid relief bill (and when you could see another stimulus check)
articles.description: Senate passage of President Joe Biden's $1.9 trillion Covid relief bill on Saturday brought the massive legislation one step closer to law.

articles.author: Homero De la Fuente, CNN
articles.title: Philadelphia stars sidelined from NBA All-Star Game due to Covid-19 protocols
articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers stars Joel Embiid and Ben Simmons were pulled from the NBA All-Star Game Sunday due to the league's Covid-19 protocols.

articles.author: Maryam Mohamed, CNN
articles.title: Jenna Dewan celebrates her 'little angel baby' in a birthday Instagram tribute
articles.description: Jenna Dewan celebrated her baby boy's first birthday in a heartwarming Instagram post, where she said her son brought with him "pure joy."

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, CNN
articles.title: Switzerland narrowly votes to ban face covering in public
articles.description: Switzerland has voted to ban full facial coverings in nearly all public places in a closely-contested referendum on Sunday.
articles.content:
(CNN)Swiss voters have approved a ban on full facial coverings including niqab and burqa in nearly all public places in a closely contested referendum on Sunday.

articles.title: Elon Musk lost $27 billion last week
articles.description: Elon Musk's net worth plunged last week as tech stocks got hammered and Tesla shares' stunning rise quickly unraveled.

articles.title: Beyoncé shares an emotional tribute to her late fan, Lyric Chanel
articles.description: Beyoncé shared an emotional video montage on Saturday to pay tribute to her late superfan, Lyric Chanel.

articles.title: 'Should any single family have this much power?': Stelter calls out the Murdochs
articles.description: CNN's Brian Stelter ponders about the future of Fox News and the Murdoch family as its patriarch, Rupert Murdoch, approaches 90 years old.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: How Republicans misunderstand the 2020 turnout story
articles.description: Numerous Republican state legislatures are trying to pass new voter restriction legislation (e.g. limiting absentee and early voting). Meanwhile, Democrats in Congress are trying to pass laws that expand access to the ballot box.

articles.title: Daniel Kaluuya, Shaka King talk 'Judas and the Black Messiah'
articles.description: Daniel Kaluuya and Shaka King join CNN's Abby Phillip to discuss how their film "Judas and the Black Messiah" is resonating decades after the killing of Chicago Black Panther leader Fred Hampton.

articles.title: Tesla is about to unveil an updated Cybertruck, Elon Musk says
articles.description: It's been more than a year since Tesla unveiled the first version of its electric Cybertruck, but Tesla CEO Elon Musk said an updated version of the car might be coming soon.

articles.title: LeBron James joins fight against GOP-led voting bills
articles.description: NBA star LeBron James is joining the fight against Republican-led bills aimed at restricting voting access, releasing a new ad campaign with his organization, More Than A Vote, called "Protect Our Power."

articles.title: How to watch Oprah's interview with Harry and Meghan
